cab.content: The War Office,12th February, 19400. F. G. S.TO BE KEPT UNDER LOCK PMy^IIt is requested that special care may be taken to ensurethe secrecy of this Document..SECRET COPY NO.Iff. P. (AO) 50WAR cabinet a R M YTwenty-third Weekly Report by the Secretary of Statefor War.(For the period 5th to 11th February, 1940).1. Movement to B.E. F.The following were shipped to B.E.F. from the United kingdom during the week:- -Personnel 5,108Vehicles 843Stores andAmmunition 25,821 tons.Included in the above were :-4 Ordnance Ammunition.CompaniesField ButcheryHeadquarters, 75th Company A.M.P.C. and 10 Sections.2. Welfare.The following Institutes and Mobile Canteens are now established at Home and Overseas : *-At Home: 1,445 Institutes..109 Mobile Canteens.Overseas: 22 Institutes.14 Mobile Canteens.These will gradually be increased to the following figures :-At Home: 457 Mobile Canteens.Overseas: 102 Institutes.132 Mobile Canteens,
